CustomField.formula:
Name & "-#" & Suite_Number__c & "-" & CASE(LEN(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c)), 1, TEXT(Suite_RSF__c),
2, TEXT(Suite_RSF__c),
3, TEXT(Suite_RSF__c),
4, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 1) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
5, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 2) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
6, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
7, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 1) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 2,3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
8, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 2) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3,3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
9, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 4,3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
10, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 1) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 2,3) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 5, 3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
11, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 2) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3,3) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 6, 3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
12, LEFT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 4,3) & "," & MID(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 7, 3) & "," & RIGHT(TEXT(Suite_RSF__c), 3),
null)
& " RSF"
CustomField.label: Suite Name
